name: Automaton (itch) (vcroteau, garbagebag, riks, Floog)
description:
Made in 3 days during the GMTK Game Jam 2020! Theme : "Out of Control"

Click the closed doors to spawn Automaton

Guide Automaton through the deadly factory! Use Springs,  Boxes, Lazers, and gravity to avoid Lava, Spikes, and Deadly androids!

requires mouse controls!

Created by:

Kris Camp

Jaden (Floog)

Tori Croteau

GarbageBag

Font used: https://www.fontspace.com/wariowareinc-font-f41008

Music The Black Kitty by Rolemusic: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic/The_Black_Dot/The_Black_Kitty
